description.full: With Pictionary™: Ultimate Edition, prepare for the ultimate family fun experience in HD! Customize your very own Pictionary™ Man game piece and prepare for quick sketches and crazy guesses with all new Pictionary™ Mania game modes and over 3,000 clues. Dazzling environments surround you on the 3D game board and drawing on the fly has never been more fun with all-new touch gestures on the uDraw GameTablet! Just as you think you've seen it all, jump into the Family Fun mode and customize your own rules of play. Ready? Set. Draw!
description.short: Now, the world's favorite drawing game is like nothing you've played before! Grab your uDraw GameTablet and prepare for over 3,000 new clues, a customizable Pictionary™ Man game piece, and all-new Pictionary™ Mania and Family Fun game modes! Pictionary™: Ultimate Edition is the ultimate family fun experience in HD!
